medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain with associated nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with one day of right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain that began as vague hypogastric pain which gradually increased to RLQ pain. Nausea started yesterday evening. Denies chills, fevers, weight loss, or night sweats. Last ate yesterday evening with minimal appetite today. Last bowel movement yesterday was normal.
